action.action-desc: Ms. Sherrill (for herself and Mr. Turner of Ohio) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend expensing of environmental remediation costs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Brownfields Redevelopment Tax Incentive Reauthorization Act of 2025.

section.header: Extension of expensing of environmental remediation costs

subsection.text: Section 198(h) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking incurred after December 31, 2011 and inserting the following:

paragraph.text: after December 31, 2011, and before January 1, 2025, or

subsection.text: The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to expenditures paid or incurred after December 31, 2024.
